This is the greater superior version from the portal franchise. It's puzzles are unique and the dialogue is interesting.
Hayden O'Brien plays it what more can I say?
Pit fall is weird, try jumping straight down through a portal and fall across the pit to a platform.
Masterpiece. I have never played a game as good as this one.
challenging puzzles and vast environments. somewhat interesting story with a great and dry sense-of-humor.
Divertido pra jogar com um amigo!!
Fun puzzle game, also the speedruns are super cool. I prefer it over portal 1 because theres more puzzles and mechanics for you to mess with.

This is one of the best games of all time and the best puzzle game I've ever played.
First of all, the gameplay is pure fun, putting portals on top of each other and falling endlessly never gets old.
The level design is also amazing and absolutely top tier. (There is even a level editor to play around with after you finish the campaign, though it's kind of annoying to use.)
Also I'd love to mention how this game makes me laugh sometimes, its clever writing never disappointed me
There is also a lot of twists and turns in the story that honestly surprised me (even though I didn't came to this game blind).
And lastly even though this game is like 10 years old already, it is still very beautiful (and moddable). So it never really runs out of fun.
